buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.lead: Use Bootstrap’s custom button styles for actions in forms, dialogs, and more. Includes support for a handful of contextual variations, sizes, states, and more.

button_group.title: Button Group
button_group.lead: Group a series of buttons together on a single line with the button group.

dropdowns.title: Dropdowns
dropdowns.lead: Variations for an extended range of possible combinations.

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.lead: Provide contextual feedback messages for typical user actions with the handful of available and flexible alert messages.

breadcrumb.title: Breadcrumb
breadcrumb.lead: Indicate the current page’s location within a navigational hierarchy that automatically adds separators via CSS.

cards.title: Cards
cards.lead: Cards provide a flexible and extensible content container with multiple variants and options.

cards_with_actions.title: Card with actions
cards_with_actions.lead: A card can also contains action links in icon format.

cards_basic_fluid.title: Basic and Fluid Cards
cards_basic_fluid.lead: Examples and few variations of basic and fluid cards

cards_carousel.title: Carousel cards
cards_carousel.lead: A slideshow component for cycling through elements—images or slides of text—like a carousel.

cards_collapse.title: Collapsible content
cards_collapse.lead: An accordion allows users to toggle the display of sections of card contents.

cards_content_types.title: Content types
cards_content_types.lead: Cards support a wide variety of content, including images, text, list groups, links, and more. Mix and match multiple content types to create the card you need.

cards_image_overlays.title: Image overlays
cards_image_overlays.lead: Turn an image into a card background and overlay your card’s text. Depending on the image, you may or may not need additional styles or utilities.

cards_layouts.title: Card layouts
cards_layouts.lead: In addition to styling the content within cards, Bootstrap includes a few options for laying out series of cards. For the time being, these layout options are not yet responsive.

cards_styles.title: Card Styles
cards_styles.lead: Cards include various options for customizing their backgrounds, borders, and color.

cards_text_align.title: Text alignment
cards_text_align.lead: You can quickly change the text alignment of any card—in its entirety or specific parts —with text align classes.

cards_video_embed.title: Video embed
cards_video_embed.lead: Create responsive video embeds based on the width of the parent by creating an intrinsic ratio that scales on any device.
